Articles.Content:
I feel stupid. I was fooling around with FMRS (which is awesome) and associated modes like RealChute.

Somewhere along the way I accrued a selection of large trusses with blue spheres in them and a very large solar panel.

I am pretty methodical about my mods, but this one has escaped. I can't find it and I didn't write it down.

Can you please help and point me to the mod with the large trusses withe blue balls?

This mod, maybe? (got a truss with a tank in it with a blue line marking)

Or this one ?(has huge solar panels in there and some trusses, but I don't see any blue spheres)

What is the shape of the trusses?
I think I know what you're talking about. The mod in question AFAIK is a remake of Tri-Hexagonal Structural Struts. I could not find a link readily available.
You really should post a screenshot of the part(s) in question; it would be a million times easier to identify.

Trusses, blue spheres and large solar panel?

Kosmos comes to mind, with it's enormous Balka solar panels... overall textures are blueish grey...

Thanks for the thoughts, unfortunately none of those are what I saw. The spheres were a bright saturated blue.

I would love to post a picture, but I deleted the mod.

This is why I feel so stupid. Config management 101.
